step_1.name: Preparation
step_1.description: Gather data, prepare the BIR Form, and draft the payment request (e.g., check voucher).

step_2.name: Report Approval
step_2.description: Senior Finance Manager (SFM) reviews and approves the report data for accuracy and compliance. (File Request is submitted to SFM.)

step_3.name: Payment Approval
step_3.description: The approved report and payment request are routed. Finance Director (FD) reviews and approves the release of funds for remittance.

step_4.name: Filing & Payment
step_4.deadline: On or before the BIR Deadline
step_4.description: The approved form is Filed and the payment is Remitted (either electronically or over the counter).
